column1: Aleksandr Stepanovich Viktorenko (????????? ?????????? ??????????) is a Soviet cosmonaut.
He was born in Olginka, North-Kazakhstan Oblast, Kazakh SSR on March 29, 1947.
He is married with two children.
He was selected as a cosmonaut on March 23, 1978, and retired on May 30, 1997.
During his active career he had been Commander of Soyuz TM-3, Soyuz TM-8, Soyuz TM-14 and Soyuz TM-20.
He has spent a total of 489 days in space.
